The body of the `if`-statement executes as many times as needed
to ensure the condition does not hold anymore and execution can continue.

frontmatter.shortDescription: The body of an if statement executes repeatedly, as long as the condition holds
frontmatter.shortCorrection: The body of an if statement executes at most once
